tweets.content: @TheGovLab: Happening Now: @sverhulst leading a discussion on data + emerging economies in Room E! Come join us! #IODC16pic.twitter.com/AmWtdHXhCT

conference_notes:
• Impact of open data on the economic development of the country is a big consideration of emerging economies.
  • We need to mention more National Statistics Agencies as they are not mentioned and, maybe, there are some doubts on their role.
  • We need more focus on data literacy (which needs to be defined as appreciating that data can be used to have meaningful impact to ordinary people). Common citizens are creative and will use data effectively if we engage them and use their same language.
  • We need to focus on solutions for specific sectors.
  • For scalability, we must look more at the demand side.
name: Data + Emerging Economies
